parameters: Oh right, difficulty ratings. Anytime a quest puts you into an area where you might end up fighting something, it will tell you approximately how strong the potential enemy is. Higher numbers indicate harder opponents, but the numbers themselves are relative. Also keep in mind that for broad groups like elves or goblins, the rating only measures the average specimine in that group, so if you go up against a goblin in full plate mail with an enchanted broadsword, he's going to be a lot stronger than the difficulty rating implies.
\C[25]\fiTo be more specific, the difficulty rating shows approximately what level you would want to be to defeat an enemy, assuming you were gaining no stat bonuses from your femininity.

You decide to stop by the guild hall, which ends up being pretty easy to find, as it’s one of the largest buildings in town. As you enter, you see quite a few adventurers lounging about and talking to one another. That seems to be the main purpose of the first floor of this building, as most of the area is taken up by tables and chairs strewn haphazardly around the place. You find what you’re looking for in the back corner, where a receptionist sits unoccupied. You approach her and ask her how you are supposed to go about joining the guild.

Oh, another new adventurer? I actually just finished signing up another newbie a moment ago. It’s pretty rare to get more than one applicant per week, let alone two in one day. Ah, I’m rambling a bit, aren’t I? Joining the guild is pretty easy, I just need to get a bit of basic info from you, and then you can go complete the trial quest to make sure you can actually fight.

\c[29]"Question one, what are your fighting capabilities? A quick summary will suffice."

\.\.\c[0]

\c[4]"Uhm, I can use fire, ice, and lightning magic, if that’s what you mean?"

\.\.\c[0]
\c[29]"Ah, you’re a sorceress then? Good to hear, we’ve been a bit lacking for mages around here, always good to have more."
Question two, what is your name and gender?
Should you pretend to be a girl here? It might be the easiest way to go about out, since you are pretty sure male sorceresses are unheard of.
Well, ready to lose? By the way, you can forfeit if you’d like, I mean, it’s not like you’ve even tried standing up to me before.
The smug look of hers kind of pisses you off, but at the same time, something about the way she says that turns you on\..\..\..
<CC Face: 1>That’s rich coming from you, are you even going to try and beat me?
Heh, prepare all you'd like, this is a forgone conclusion anyways.
Well, ready to lose? By the way, you can forfeit if you’d like, I mean, it’s not like you’ve even tried standing up to me before.
The smug look of hers kind of pisses you off, but at the same time, something about the way she says that turns you on\..\..\..
<CC Face: 1>That’s rich coming from you, are you even going to try and beat me?
Heh, prepare all you'd like, this is a forgone conclusion anyways.
Why does the guild have a bar?

So, I’m holding her up so she’s facing away from me, and the noises this little slut was making as I pounded her ass, you wouldn’t \fibelieve\fi them, honestly. She must have squirted all over the dungeon like, three, maybe four times before I finally busted in her. Left her drooling on the floor—from more holes than one, mind you—before I got back the gem she stole.
A woman with the fakest possible smile on her face is doing her best to suffer through this story, but you’ve noticed her eye keeps twitching as he goes on.
What a lovely story, but all I need you to do is hand over the item in question, so\..\..\..
Right, right, I’ll get to that, but you see, after I finished pumping that slut’s guts full, her \fisister\fi comes out of the cave and\..\..\..
You decide you have heard more than enough of that story. You should try and ignore him and talk to the clerk instead.
You decide you have heard more than enough of that story. You should probably just go talk to Brittany if you need to speak to a guild representative, this poor woman is going to be here for a while.
And so all three of the vixens must have cum around my cock like, eight times before I was done. By the way, are you free after this?
Unfortunately, I am working a twenty-four hour shift all this week, so I won’t be free.
Ah that’s a shame, well anyways, \fithen\fi this werewolf girl shows up, and you know she’s in heat, so\..\..\..

The werewolf’s been riding me fore at \fileast\fi an hour by now, and she’s starting to slow down, yammering on about how she’s never met a human with as much endurance as I’ve got. Anyways, she gets me to cum one more time before flopping onto me, and I’m just like, “Do you think we’re done here?” Cus I wasn't, so I pushed her onto her back and just kept jackhammering into her. Not the kind of shit I’m getting into\..\..\..
Sir, if you could \fiplease\fi just hand over the—

Twenty-four hour shifts all this week you said, right?
So then you couldn’t come out for a drink later tonight, or the next night, or the night after, yeah?
Or the night after that, or the night after that, or the night after \fithat\fi, or the night after that, \fior\..\..\..\fi the night after that, right?
But you \fiwould\fi be free the night after \fithat\fi, wouldn’t you?
Great! I’ll be sure to swing by when your shifts about to end, and we can go to my place for some drinks.
Oh, that reminds me, I didn’t tell you about the Oni girls! Man, those girls know how to drink \fiand\fi how to fuck. So, there I was\..\..\..
T-The girl running the counter is just slowly banging her head against the desk in front of her\..\..\.. and the guy still hasn’t shut the fuck up. S-Should you get help, or\..\..\..?

You try to get the other clerk's attention, but unfortunately, she can’t seem to extract herself out of the conversation she’s having with this other guy, regardless of how un-subtle she expresses her lack of interest in him. You’re going to have to do something about him, aren’t you?

<CC Face: 1,3>\fi\c[27]Heyyyy\..\..\..\fi \c[0]I couldn’t help but overhear about all your stories about the various monster girls you’ve been with, and your \fiincredible\fi sexual prowess, and was wondering if you’d like to bend me over and fuck my brains out?
U-Uh, w-what? I mean, yeah! Hell yeah!
<CC Face: 1,3>Great! I just need to accept a quest real quick, could you wait for me out behind the guild hall? I’ll be out in a minute.
Oh, I could just wait for you here. I’m not doing anything important.
<CC Face: 1,3>Oh, I noticed.\.\. But I was hoping you’d be completely nude by the time I got there, so we can get right to the point. Could you do that for me?
The goon sprints off, unbuckling his pants as he runs out the building.
<CC Face: 1>Alright, great, he’s gone. Could I accept this quest real quick?

You have a brief and much more normal conversation than USUAL about the quest. Brittany does have you marked down as a Bronze adventurer, so no worries there. You’ll just have to follow that map to the location, as it \fiis\fi literally in the middle of nowhere.
\u[62,1]Um, are you really gonna go out there with that guy? I’m like, 99% sure he was making up all those exploits of his incredible sexual prowess.
<CC Face: 1>Oh, yeah, obviously. No, I’m just going to leave and go do the quest. I just needed him to fuck off so I could accept it, because Brittany ran off to try and get gangbanged by Lizardmen.
\u[62,1]\fiAgain?!?\fi I need to find somewhere else to work\..\..\..
You thank the clerk, and head back out to Elmgar, ready to start the next dungeon quest.
Yeah, going to go for the path of least resistance here, and just shoot some lightning at him.
Alright, great. Now that that’s out of the way\..\..\..
<CC Face: 1>Hey, I wanted to accept this dungeon quest\..\..\..
\u[62,1]Uh, you realize you just assaulted another guild member, right?
<CC Face: 1,8>Are you going to write me up for it?
<CC Face: 1,2>Great, so, anyways, about this quest\..\..\..

You have a brief and much more normal conversation than usual about the quest. Brittany does have you marked down as a Bronze adventurer, so no worries there. You’ll just have to follow that map to the location, as it \fiis\fi literally in the middle of nowhere.
<CC Face: 1>Alright, thanks. Want me to dump this guy out back or something?
\u[62,1]Uh, sure. Yeah, that would be great, actually.
<CC Face: 1>No problem. Hopefully he doesn’t come back. See ya.
You grab the guy by the collar and drag him out, depositing him facedown in an alley behind the building, before you head back to Elmgar.
An adventurer is perusing this board, you’ll have to stick to the open one.
Five Lizardman loincloths? Why? Those poor Lizardmen are going to be forced to walk around nude after we take all their clothing. \fiHah\..\..\..\fi well, the pay is pretty good, so I guess\..\..\..

Surely Brittany didn’t just\..\..\.. Oh god she was just sniffing a loincloth. She really did make a quest just to get more of those things. What is up with that girl? And how does she have the money to waste on this stuff?
“Cute boys wanted for hands on body experiments.” Damn, that’s sketchy as all hell, who put this up\..\..\.. Woah, that’s a hefty set of knockers. Fuck it, I’m in.

You take a peep at the quest over his shoulder, and see at the bottom a very detailed drawing of Beatrice has been attached, conveniently done from the bust-up. Looks like he took the last slot for the “quest” though, you wouldn’t have minded being payed to let Beatrice play with your body, although you aren’t sure that adventurer knows what he’s in for.

You take a peep at the quest over his shoulder, and see at the bottom a very detailed drawing of Beatrice has been attached, conveniently done from the bust-up. Damn, you could have been getting paid to let Beatrice play with you?
\C[25]Slay Balzemuth, terror of the HellFrost Peaks!
Seduce Balzemuth, terror of the HellFrost Peaks!
Negotiate a peace treaty with Balzemuth, terror of the HellFrost Peaks!

Skimming over them, they are clearly three separate quests all to deal with Balzemuth, which is some sort of legendary ice dragon. The last one is especially desperate, stating that any adventurer willing to attempt the quest may “plead for mercy from this fiend via any means, we will provide any goods, land, or sacrifices required to quell Balzemuth’s unyielding thirst for blood!” \| Luckily, these are diamond rank quests, so you don’t even have to feel bad completely ignoring them. You doubt the HellFrost Peaks are nice this time of year anyways.
An abandoned drink. You suppose you could have some\..\..\.. but that would be like an indirect kiss with whoever bought it, so you’d better not.
An abandoned drink. You suppose you could have some\..\..\.. it’s good, but when you think about how someone else’s lips touched this glass, you can’t help but feel like a pervert.
An abandoned drink. Well, if whoever bought it doesn’t want it, you might as well be sure it isn’t wasted. It’s not like you’re afraid of cooties or something.
The second floor of the guild. It says "Gold Rank and above." by the stairs.
Hey, wanna go on a date?
Duh, do you think I’m asking for someone else? And that I’d \filet\fi someone else date you?
<CC Face: 1>Ah, so you haven’t found out about—oops, I should keep my mouth shut.
Hah, hah, very funny. Now, that date?
Well, I was going to go change first, but yeah, now. Or whenever you’re free.
You’re surprised Katie would care enough about her appearance to want to change for a date, but oh well. It probably won’t take her long, regardless.
<CC Face: 1>Sure, I’m not busy, we can go now.
Great! I’ll meet you by the fountain in the city square, in like\..\..\.. fifteen minutes or so?
Well, whenever you're free, just let me know.
Katie blows you a kiss as you glance over and spot her lounging at a table in the guild, and beckons you closer with a finger. You could go see what she wants, if you want.
Hey, wanna come over to my place for a bit?
You see Katie staring off into space at one of the tables, and are filled with the sudden urge to make out with her. You wonder if you can get her to go along with that, in the middle of the guild.
Hey Cutie, I’ve been seeing you around the guild a lot, why don’t you come get a few drinks with us at the bar? Too stiff around here, doesn’t really have the right mood to relax, know what I mean?
\..\..\..And the bar has rooms that one could spend the night in, of course.
\fiAhem,\fi please, uh, ignore everything these two have said, and perhaps continue ignoring them in the future? \fs[16]We could probably just hang out alone, just the two of us?
So, as I was saying, four inches may \fiseem\fi small, but really, when you count for the curvature\..\..\..

You find Katie lounging about the Guild. You can probably try to force her to wear that dress you bought for her now, if you’d like.
What.\. The.\. Fuck.\. Is that \fiKatie\fi in a skirt? And not one you bought for her?
\c[2]Don't look at me like that, \fiyou\fi are the reason I'm forced to wear this thing\..\..\..
\c[2]I can't wear any of my pants because—\fs[18]b-because of how sore my ass is.\fs[28] The material is too tight, squeezes things unpleasantly.
<CC Face: 1,2>\c[4]Ah. I see. Well, you look great in that skirt.
\c[2]S-Stop staring. You've seen me in a dress before, this isn't \fithat\fi different.
This skirt of hers shows off \fiquite\fi a bit of leg though. You'd bet it's something she used to wear when she was younger.
As you enter the guild, you spot Katie. And as Katie spots you, she jumps in place, fidgeting nervously. Perhaps you should go speak with her? \fi\c[25]This will instantly start a sex scene.
